title: LuckPerms权限组问题
author: Fs_guigui
txt_content: LuckPerms如何做到让 服务器A没有飞行权限 而 服务器B有飞行权限

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
Fs_guigui 发表于 2020-5-19 16:20
如果是权限组 player 
服务器是  jyf
该怎么写？
/lp group player permission set essentials.fly true server=jyf

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: /lp user a permission set essentials.fly true server=B

replies.author: Fs_guigui
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-19 16:17
/lp user a permission set essentials.fly true server=B
如果是权限组 player 
服务器是  jyf
该怎么写？
